item.title: ASML-Mistral人工智能交易提振欧洲科技希望，特朗普竞争白热化
item.description: 荷兰芯片设备制造商ASML斥资15亿美元收购法国人工智能公司Mistral，为欧洲的人工智能雄心注入了一剂强心针，也为欧洲在美国和亚洲竞争对手的主导下获得更多地区科技主权带来了希望。【原文：Dutch chip-gear maker ASML's $1.5 billion investment in French artificial intelligence firm Mistral has given a shot in the arm to Europe's AI ambitions and hopes for more regional tech sovereignty against the dominance of U.S. and Asian rivals.】

item.title: 菲利普斯 66 将以 14 亿美元从 Cenovus 收购 WRB 炼油公司剩余股份
item.description: 美国炼油商菲利普斯 66 周二表示，将以 14 亿美元的价格从 Cenovus Energy 手中收购 WRB Refining 剩余的 50% 股份，从而完全拥有美国两大炼油厂。【原文：U.S. refiner Phillips 66 said on Tuesday it will acquire the remaining 50% stake in WRB Refining from Cenovus Energy for $1.4 billion, giving it full ownership of two major U.S. refineries.】

item.title: 礼来推出人工智能药物发现平台
item.description: 制药商礼来公司周二表示，它将推出一个人工智能和机器学习平台，为生物技术公司提供基于多年研究数据训练的药物发现模型。【原文：Drugmaker Eli Lilly said on Tuesday it is launching an artificial intelligence and machine learning platform that provides biotech companies access to drug discovery models trained on years of its research data.】

item.title: 瑞典推出人工智能音乐许可证以保护词曲作者
item.description: 瑞典音乐版权组织推出了一项许可，允许人工智能公司合法使用受版权保护的歌曲来训练他们的模型，同时确保歌曲作者和作曲家获得报酬。【原文：Sweden’s music rights organisation has introduced a licence that allows artificial intelligence companies to legally use copyrighted songs for training their models, while ensuring that songwriters and composers are paid.】

item.title: 欧洲汽车制造商在中国面临关税和价格战，"狂欢结束了
item.description: 悄悄地说，在欧洲最大的汽车展上，在闪亮的新车型和耀眼的灯光的喧闹声中，汽车工业部门担心他们的派对已经结束了。【原文：Whisper it quietly, but beneath the buzz of shiny new car models and bright lights at Europe's largest car show, the industry sector is worried that their party is over.】

item.title: 汇丰银行认为欧佩克+自愿减产措施明年将逐步解除
item.description: 汇丰银行周二在一份报告中说，该行最新的石油市场供需模型预计，欧佩克+将在12个月内逐步解除每天165万桶的 "第一阶段 "自愿减产。【原文：HSBC's latest oil market supply and demand model envisions OPEC+ gradually unwinding 1.65 million barrels per day in "first-phase" voluntary production cuts over a 12-month period, the bank said in a note on Tuesday.】

item.title: 与微软达成 174 亿美元人工智能计算交易，Nebius 跃居榜首
item.description: 周二，Nebius 集团的股价飙升近 50%，达到 95.7 美元，投资者对其在五年内向微软提供人工智能基础设施的 174 亿美元交易表示欢迎。【原文：Nebius Group's shares soared nearly 50% to $95.7 on Tuesday as investors cheered its $17.4-billion deal supplying AI infrastructure to Microsoft over a five-year period.】

item.title: 大众汽车将在十年前向人工智能领域投资 10 亿欧元
item.description: 德国汽车制造商大众汽车公司周二表示，到 2030 年，该公司将在人工智能领域投资高达 10 亿欧元（12 亿美元），将该技术引入其业务的各个领域，以节省数十亿美元的成本。【原文：Volkswagen will invest up to a billion euros ($1.2 billion) in artificial intelligence by 2030, feeding the technology into every area of its business in a bid to unlock billions in savings, the German carmaker said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 早间竞价：就业忧虑加剧，美元下滑
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 英美资源集团和泰克资源公司的主要采矿资产
item.description: 伦敦上市矿商英美资源周二表示，已同意与加拿大泰克资源公司（Teck Resources）合并，这将是十多年来矿业领域最大的并购交易。【原文：London-listed miner Anglo American said on Tuesday it has agreed to a merger with Canada's Teck Resources , in what would be the biggest mining sector M&A deal in over a decade.】

item.title: 英美资源集团 530 亿美元并购泰克资源公司之路
item.description: 在伦敦上市的矿业公司英美资源周二表示，它已同意与加拿大泰克资源公司合并，这将是十多年来矿业领域最大的并购交易。【原文：London-listed miner Anglo American said on Tuesday it has agreed a merger with Canada's Teck Resources , in what would be the biggest mining sector M&A deal in over a decade.】

item.title: 联合利华预计分拆后 Magnum 冰淇淋销售额将增长 3-5
item.description: 联合利华（Unilever）在周二的资本市场日之前表示，该公司预计从 2026 年起，其分拆出来的 Magnum 旗下冰淇淋部门的年均有机销售额将在中期内增长 3-5%。【原文：Unilever expects the Magnum-led ice cream unit it is spinning off to see average annual organic sales growth of 3-5% in the medium-term from 2026, the company said ahead of a capital markets day on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称，阿尔泰资本为 OraSure Technologies 董事会之争奠定基础
item.description: 两位熟悉此事的人士告诉路透社，Altai Capital Management 正准备在 OraSure Technologies 发起一场董事会斗争，因为这家对冲基金已经是这家医疗设备制造商的最大所有者之一，它增持了该公司的股份。【原文：Altai Capital Management is preparing to launch a board fight at OraSure Technologies after the hedge fund, already one of the biggest owners of the medical device maker, increased its holdings, two people familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 炼油州参议员希望阻止特朗普转移可再生燃料义务
item.description: 根据路透社看到的立法草案，以犹他州共和党参议员迈克-李（Mike Lee）为首的炼油州立法者将于周二提出立法，阻止唐纳德-特朗普总统将小型炼油厂的可再生燃料混合义务转移给大型炼油厂。【原文：Oil refinery-state lawmakers led by Senator Mike Lee, a Republican from Utah, will introduce legislation on Tuesday to block President Donald Trump from shifting renewable fuel blending obligations from small refineries to larger ones, according to draft legislation seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 即时观点：盎格鲁集团和泰克集团斥资 530 亿美元打造矿业巨头，押注铜需求激增
item.description: 在伦敦上市的英美资源公司和加拿大泰克资源公司周二表示，两家公司将以 530 亿美元的交易合并，这是十多年来最大的矿业合作。【原文：London-listed Anglo American and Canada's Teck Resources will merge in a $53 billion deal, the companies said on Tuesday, the biggest mining tie-up in more than a decade.】

item.title: 美国小型企业乐观情绪上升，但对劳动力质量的担忧依然存在
item.description: 由于预期销售额会增加，8 月份美国小型企业的景气度进一步提高，但对可用劳动力质量的担忧依然存在。【原文：U.S. small-business sentiment improved further in August amid expectations for higher sales, but worries about the quality of available labor lingered.】

item.title: 特斯拉如何实现 8.5 万亿美元的价值？机器人、机器人轴和希望
item.description: 特斯拉如何才能成为一家价值 8.5 万亿美元的公司？这是这家电动汽车制造商必须达到的市场估值，以证明首席执行官埃隆-马斯克上周宣布的新薪酬方案是合理的。【原文：How can Tesla become an $8.5 trillion company? That's the market valuation the electric vehicle maker would have to reach to justify CEO Elon Musk's new pay package announced last week.】

item.title: 苹果发布会有望推出更轻薄的 iPhone，但定价和人工智能问题仍未解决
item.description: 苹果公司预计将于周二发布新款 iPhone，其中包括一款更薄的 "Air "机型，它可能是明年推出的折叠手机的前身。【原文：Apple on Tuesday is expected to unveil a new lineup of iPhones, including a thinner "Air" model that could be a precursor to a folding phone next year.】

item.title: 美国股市在薪资基准修订前表现低迷
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货走势低迷，此前主要股指在上一交易日创下近历史收盘新高，投资者在就业率即将修正前保持谨慎。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were subdued on Tuesday after the major indexes posted near-record closing highs in the previous session and investors remained cautious ahead of an impending employment rate revision.】

item.title: 日经新闻》称丰田将整合雷克萨斯在美国的生产基地
item.description: 据《日经新闻》周二报道，面对特朗普政府征收的高额关税，丰田汽车公司将把其豪华雷克萨斯品牌汽车在美国的生产基地从两个整合为一个。【原文：Toyota Motor will consolidate production of its luxury Lexus brand cars in the United States into a single location from two in the face of high tariffs imposed by the Trump administration, the Nikkei reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国豪华汽车制造商红旗到 2028 年将在欧洲推出 15 款车型
item.description: 中国豪华汽车制造商红旗汽车周二表示，将于2028年前在欧洲25个不同市场推出15款电动和混合动力车型，同时还发布了紧凑型电动SUV EHS5。【原文：Chinese luxury automaker Hongqi said on Tuesday that it would launch 15 electric and hybrid models in Europe by 2028 across 25 different markets as it also unveiled the EHS5, a compact electric SUV.】

item.title: 意大利 Domyn 公司聘请前 BlackRock 高管领导新的金融人工智能部门
item.description: 意大利人工智能初创公司 Domyn 周二表示，该公司已任命前贝莱德（BlackRock）董事总经理斯特凡诺-帕斯夸里（Stefano Pasquali）为新成立的金融服务部门负责人。【原文：Italian AI startup Domyn has appointed former BlackRock managing director Stefano Pasquali to head its newly launched financial services division, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 默茨表示，德国未来应在汽车行业处于领先地位，而非落后地位
item.description: 德国总理弗里德里希-梅尔茨（Friedrich Merz）周二表示，德国应在推动电动汽车行业发展的过程中发挥带头作用，而不是冒着落后的风险，因为亚洲竞争对手和贸易壁垒使德国汽车制造商更难参与竞争。【原文：Germany should lead the charge in the sector's push towards electric mobility and not risk falling behind as Asian rivals and trade barriers make it harder for the country's automakers to compete, Chancellor Friedrich Merz said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国 8 月集装箱进口增长，关税动荡令年底前景黯淡
item.description: 供应链技术提供商笛卡尔周二表示，尽管在唐纳德-特朗普总统贸易政策的不确定性影响下，来自中国和其他主要供应商的进口量出现下滑，但美国 8 月份的集装箱货物进口量仍同比增长了 1.6%。【原文：U.S. imports of containerized goods rose 1.6% year-over-year in August, even as volume from China and other key suppliers tumbled amid uncertainty over President Donald Trump's trade policy, supply chain technology provider Descartes said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，温克艾沃斯创办的加密货币交易所 Gemini 寻求纳斯达克作为战略投资者
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的人士透露，卡梅隆-温克莱沃斯（Cameron Winklevoss）和泰勒-温克莱沃斯（Tyler Winklevoss）创办的加密货币交易所双子座空间站（Gemini Space Station）已获得纳斯达克作为战略投资者，本周将在纽约上市。【原文：Gemini Space Station, the cryptocurrency exchange founded by Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss, has secured Nasdaq as a strategic investor as it moves forward with plans for a New York listing this week, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国制裁缅甸和柬埔寨价值数十亿美元的网络诈骗网络
item.description: 根据美国财政部的一份声明，美国周二对缅甸和柬埔寨的网络诈骗运营商实施制裁，美国称这一蓬勃发展的行业去年从美国人手中窃取了数百亿美元。【原文：The United States imposed sanctions on cyber scam operators in Myanmar and Cambodia on Tuesday, a booming industry the U.S. says stole tens of billions from Americans last year, according to a Treasury Department statement.】

item.title: 随着年底最后期限的临近，印度和欧盟努力缩小贸易谈判中的差距
item.description: 印度政府和欧盟消息人士称，印度和欧盟本周将在新德里举行可能具有决定性意义的贸易谈判，寻求解决在农业、乳制品和非关税壁垒方面的分歧，以在雄心勃勃的年底最后期限前达成协议。【原文：India and the European Union are holding potentially decisive trade negotiations in New Delhi this week, seeking to resolve differences over agriculture, dairy and non-tariff barriers to meet an ambitious end of year deadline for a deal, Indian government and EU sources said.】

item.title: 关税生效后，8月份越南对美国出口和从中国进口均下降
item.description: 本周二，越南海关数据显示，由于对运往美国的货物征收 20% 的关税生效，8 月份越南对美国的出口额比 7 月份下降了 2%，降至 139.4 亿美元。【原文：Vietnam's exports to the United States fell 2% in August from July to $13.94 billion, Vietnamese customs data showed on Tuesday, as a tariff of 20% on shipments to the United States took effect.】

item.title: 韩国金融科技公司 Toss 计划从澳大利亚开始向全球推广，目标是发行韩元稳定币
item.description: 韩国金融科技独角兽公司Toss创始人兼首席执行官李承郡（Lee Seung-gun）表示，Toss计划今年在澳大利亚推出其 "一体化 "金融应用程序，并向其他市场扩张。【原文：South Korean fintech unicorn Toss plans to launch its "all-in-one" finance app in Australia this year and expand to other markets, and aims to issue a won-based stablecoin once regulations allow, said founder and CEO Lee Seung-gun.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，福特将因后视摄像头故障在美国召回近 150 万辆汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周二表示，由于后视摄像头问题导致图像倒置、扭曲或空白，增加了车祸风险，福特将在美国召回145.6417万辆汽车。【原文：Ford is recalling 1,456,417 vehicles in the U.S. due to a rear-view camera issue causing inverted, distorted, or blank image, increasing the risk of a crash, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Tuesday.】
